details:
verb
- prepare for sleep
= synonyms: go to bed
- cause to get out
= example: cause to get out
= synonyms: strike out
- cause to be out on a fielding play
= synonyms: put out
- lose interest
= example: lose interest
= synonyms: withdraw
- pull back or move away or backward
= synonyms: retreat
- dispose of something no longer useful or needed
= example: dispose of something no longer useful or needed
- go into retirement
- withdraw from active participation
= example: withdraw from active participation
= synonyms: withdraw
- make (someone) retire
= example: make (someone) retire
- break from a meeting or gathering
= synonyms: withdraw, adjourn
- withdraw from circulation or from the market, as of bills, shares, and bonds
